name: The Last Defender (Ivess)
description:
You are the last hope of the village! Defend it from unstoppable hordes of hulks, skellies and mages! Kill, die, upgrade, REPEAT!

The game is a small action top-down shooter in which the player and the enemies are placed on one of the traces. You need to defend yourself, shooting up the enemies that appear on these tracks. They will try to kill you as well, so be careful! Fortunately, there's a nice bartender, who is always ready to heal you up when you die AND sell you something useful - for a price, of course!

Dive into this crazy fast-paced shooter!

The game was developed in under 48-non-consecutive hours restriction and participates in Miz Jam 1. You can also download source project to see the project's structure and code.
